properties.areaDesc: Martin, IN; Daviess, IN; Dubois, IN; Pike, IN
properties.headline: Flood Warning issued January 10 at 10:25AM EST until January 19 at 10:36AM EST by NWS Indianapolis IN
properties.description:
...The National Weather Service in Indianapolis has issued a Flood
Warning for portions of the following waterways in central and
southern Indiana...

Big Blue River...East Fork White River...Flatrock River...
...The National Weather Service in Indianapolis has upgraded the
flood category from Minor to Moderate severity for the following
rivers and streams in Illinois...Indiana...

White River at Hazleton

...The National Weather Service in Indianapolis has upgraded the
flood category from Minor to Moderate severity for the following
rivers and streams

Driftwood River near Edinburgh 2 SW
East Fork White River at Seymour
White River near Centerton
White River below Eagle Valley Power Plant
White River at Spencer
White River at Elliston
White River at Edwardsport
White River at Petersburg


.With rainfall totals between 1 to 2 inches there are
widespread flooding concerns across much of Indiana. Over the next
couple of days we will see another 1 to 3 inches of rain or more
possible.

The National Weather Service in Indianapolis has issued a

* Flood Warning for
the East Fork White River at Shoals.
* from Saturday evening to Sunday January 19.
* At  9:30 AM Friday the stage was 8.4 feet.
* Flood stage is 20.0 feet.
* Minor flooding is forecast.
* Forecast...Rise above flood stage by Saturday evening and continue
to rise to near 21.6 feet by late Saturday night.  It will fall
below flood stage by Saturday January 18.
* At 22.0 feet...Lowland flooding affects all local roads in the flood
plain.  Farmers must move some livestock to higher ground.  State
Road 550 floods on left bank.  Roads that flood include West River,
Spout Spring, Cemetery, East River, Chicken Farm and a few other
side roads near the river.  East Fork White River forms at least
one island.  Two families are nearly isolated.  Significant
agricultural flooding is in progress.
